items.name: Tips
items.description: Peer-to-peer tips endpoints. Tips represent value transfers between users. Access rules are strict and role-dependent.

query.description: The page to load
query.name: page

query.description: The number of results to return per page
query.name: limit

query.description: Filter by tip type: sent, received, or all
query.name: type

query.description: Filter by tip status
query.name: status

query.description: Order by field
query.name: orderBy

query.description: Order direction
query.name: orderDir

api.description: List all tips for the authenticated user. Users see only their own sent/received tips. Admins can see all tips.
Get a specific tip by ID. Only the sender, recipient, or admin can view.

parameters.description: Optional artisan ID to associate with the tip
parameters.name: artisan_id

api.description: Create a new peer-to-peer tip. The authenticated user becomes the sender.

responses.name: Validation Error
responses.description: Only pending tips can be updated

api.description: Update tip status. Only the sender or admin can update. Only PENDING tips can be updated to COMPLETED or CANCELLED.
Create a tip for a specific artisan. The tip goes to the artisan's curator.

parameters.description: Optional artisan ID (must belong to this curator)
parameters.name: artisan_id

api.description: Create a tip for a specific curator.

query.name: tags
query.description: Comma separated tags
